short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The latest images sent by the rover Curiosity directly in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The latest images sent by the rover Curiosity from Mars directly in your browser.
Click in the icon for open gallery with the latest images sent by rover Curiosity.
You can choose the camera and browse the images.
Button to animate images.
There is also an archive with the images of the last week and the climate data of the red planet update daily.

The climate data are:
- Minimun temperature, degrees Celsius
- Maximun temperature, degrees Celsius
- Atmospheric pressure, Pascals
- Wind speed, Km/h.
- Current season on Mars.

(Data and image updates are usually every 24 hours. But in any case they always depend on NASA)
